I am Martin, a Researcher at the International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA) working on ecological, socio-economic and environmental nexus topics. I am widely interested in (Macro-)Ecology, Conservation Biology and Sustainability Science with regards to global change. 

I am a Specialist in remote-sensing analysis and interpreting spatial data, having many years of experience in project management and providing quantitative solutions to environmental problems.

Please feel free to [contact me](https://iiasa.ac.at/staff/martin-jung) if you would like to discuss potential collaborations.

## Broad Interests

- Conservation biology

- Science Policy
    
- Global Change and Sustainability

- Biodiversity indicators
    
- GIS and Remote Sensing
